text: Oo hadday haweeney ka cabsato dhaqan xumi48 ama jeedsasho Xagga ninkeeda ah, ma jiro eed korkooda ah, hadday ka heshiiyaan dhexdooda heshiis, oo heshiiska baa khayr badan, oo nafaha Aadmiga waxaa lagu laray masuugnimo. Oo haddaad samo fashaan oo iska ilaalisaan (xumaha), haddaba hubaal, Allaah waa u Xog ogaal waxa aad fashaan
